track.strDescriptionEN:
"Little Talks" is the debut single by the Icelandic indie folk/indie pop rock band Of Monsters and Men. The song was released as the lead single from their debut studio album, My Head Is an Animal (2012). It was also released on the band's EP Into the Woods. It was written by Nanna Bryndís Hilmarsdóttir and Ragnar Þórhallsson, and produced by Aron Þór Arnarsson (all of Of Monsters And Men). The song is written in the key of Bb minor.

A music video was released to the public via YouTube on 2 February 2012. The video was created by the production firm WeWereMonkeys. It was nominated in the 2012 MTV Video Music Awards for Best Art Direction in a Video.

"Visionary epic fantasy – like Bjork meets Woodkid with a bit of Monty Python thrown in – for Icelandic band Of Monsters And Men's Little Talks, brilliantly conceived by WeWereMonkeys - that's Mihai Wilson and Marcella Moser." (David Knight, Promonews)
